name: sober
content:
sober adjective
(NOT DRUNK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 not drunk or affected by alcohol: Are you sober enough to drive, Jim? I'd had no wine all evening so I was stone cold (= completely) sober.
(of an alcoholic) not having had an alcoholic drink for a period of time: Steve is a recovering alcoholic who has been sober for a decade. A family crisis often forces alcoholics to get sober.
More examplesFewer examplesI hadn't drunk a thing - I was completely sober.I was too sober to enjoy the party.I'd better be sober by the time my mother gets here.He seemed fairly sober to me.I have to drive tonight so I'm sober.
